oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthetic discrete tomography problems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Swoboda, Paul
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 006 Special computer methods
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Small synthetic discrete tomography problems. Sizes are 32x32, 64z64 and 256x256. Projection angles are 2, 4, and 6. Number of labels are 3 and 5.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Swoboda, Paul Synthetic discrete tomography problems. [Data Collection] (Unpublished)
